abstract: Credit Suisse and Citigroup are competing to secure a Chinese partner to set up an investment banking joint venture to tap the country’s fast growing capital markets, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse and Citigroup are competing to secure a Chinese partner to set up an investment banking joint venture to tap the country’s fast growing capital markets, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Citi, Credit Suisse Said to Fight Over China Venture
